message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $100. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $95. This is a special opportunity to own a product that's worth more than what you're paying, making it a great deal for you. Don't miss out on this chance to save while getting a fantastic item. Let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with the purchase.
